K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-0: @328a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-3: tri sh'a tri shu la sh'a khi /
K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-4: a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung
K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-11: du dkyil 'khor byas te ci 'byor bas mchod pa
K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-12: byas la / chu la sngags kyis btab ste bzhag
K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-13: nas nang bar chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas
K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-14: te dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang sbags te
K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-15: byas la / zos na / zhag bdun lon na
K12D0714=D1045_H0571:328a-16: nyin gcig kyang shloo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro;
